alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 5:02AM PST until December 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern San Diego County Valleys, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 3 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated gusts to 65 mph possible below the San Gorgonio Pass and on the coastal slopes of the Cuyamaca Mountains.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
